audience_blurbs.engineering: Ship with confidence by tying Day 19 release score to concrete checklist and evidence artifacts.
audience_blurbs.non_maintainers: What changed: clearer quality gates, faster release confidence, and traceable evidence for audits.
audience_blurbs.support: Use highlights + risks sections to pre-brief known changes and probable user questions.

call_to_action: Share this narrative in release notes, weekly updates, and community announcements.
highlights: add Day 86 launch readiness closeout lane command, docs, checks, and tests (`day86-launch-readiness-closeout`).
CI gate: run `sdetkit doctor --all` and `sdetkit repo check --profile enterprise` on every PR.
Enterprise hardening: GitHub Actions pinned to commit SHAs.
Dependency hygiene: requirements pinned and lockfiles added.
Repo init/apply reliability: tolerate non-UTF-8 preset template files.
name: day20-release-narrative

narrative_channels.community_post: Shipping update: stronger quality gates, clearer evidence, and a smoother adoption path for teams.
narrative_channels.internal_update: Day 20 narrative pack is ready. Reuse the highlights/risks sections in weekly status and customer comms.
narrative_channels.release_notes: This release is ready to communicate broadly with a stable quality posture. Key highlights: add Day 86 launch readiness closeout lane command, docs, checks, and tests (`day86-launch-readiness-closeout`).

risks: Release posture is strong; proceed with release candidate tagging and notes preparation.

summary.headline: This release is ready to communicate broadly with a stable quality posture.
